text: A man who has spent more than $ 50, 000 transforming himself into a'genderless alien,'is offering plastic surgery advice to a Britney Spears impersonator who is looking to get a second nose job ahead of his wedding. Make - up artist Vinny Ohh, 25, asked Dr. Terry Dubrow and Dr. Paul Nassif to construct him a nose that was truly out of this world when he first appeared on Botched in 2016, but the doctors refused to deform him. Vinny has returned to the E! reality series to help guide his friend Bryan Ray, 32, who is looking to get his'perfect nose'for his'dream wedding.'Scroll down for video Two of a kind : Vinny Ohh ( L ), who has spent $ 50, 000 transforming himself
